ygData.subject: Re: crushbone
ygData.msgSnippet: This is what i can tell you about Drybones Skeletons in lake rathe. 1. A level 17 Cleric and level 17 Necro (with a pet ) can take one on. 2. They always
ygData.messageBody:
This is what i can tell you about Drybones Skeletons in lake rathe.

1. A level 17 Cleric and level 17 Necro (with a pet ) can take one on.
2. They always Conned red to us.
3. 3 out of 4 i killed last night had small bronze plate. Not large. They
dont carry large.
4. They attack on sight, including other mobs.
5. They spawn very fast in the area right next to the zone to the Karanas so
make sure you keep your eyes open.

Lothaniel/Rayne

> forever. THANK YOU
> how hard are the dry bones to kill, and how often does the ones with the
> armor spawn
>
> Arathorne, Solsek Ro
